text: Catherine Martin (born 26 January 1965) is an Australian costume designer, production designer, set designer, and movie producer. She has won two Academy Awards for Moulin Rouge! (2001) in 2002 and another two for The Great Gatsby (2013) in 2014. This makes her the most awarded Australian in Oscar history. Martin was born in Lindfield, Sydney, New South Wales. She is married to movie director Baz Luhrmann. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie producers Category:Costume designers Category:People from Sydney Category:Best Costume Design Academy Award winners Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:Tony Award winners Category:Set designers
title: Catherine Martin
